cloud_say.name: Say a TTS message with cloud
cloud_say.description: Say something using text-to-speech on a media player with cloud.

backup_schedule_start.name: Backup start
backup_schedule_start.description: Backup start time if time retrieval fails.

backup_schedule_end.name: Backup end
backup_schedule_end.description: Backup end time if start time retrieval fails.

append_backup.name: Append backup
append_backup.description: Append the backup period to the schedule.

set_schedule.description: To be used by 🐙 Octopus Agile users with the Octopus Energy integration, specifically the Target Rates sensors which allow you to find the cheapest periods between two times.
set_schedule.name: Set schedule

stop_all.description: Force-stop all SolaX hubs (kills timers, tasks, sockets).
stop_all.name: Stop all SolaX hubs

name.name: Hub name
name.description: Name of the hub to stop (e.g., "SolaX")

stop_hub.description: Force-stop a single SolaX hub by name.
stop_hub.name: Stop a specific SolaX hub

purge_invalid_external_statistic_ids.description: Removes external statistics for all meters that don't have an active tariff
purge_invalid_external_statistic_ids.name: Purge invalid external statistics

point_in_time.name: Point in time
point_in_time.description: The datetime of the point in time to retrieve the application intelligent dispatch history for

get_point_in_time_intelligent_dispatch_h.description: Retrieve the intelligent dispatch history which was active for a given point in time based on up to the last 48 hours of intelligent dispatches that have been captured locally. For more information please see https://bottlecapdave.github.io/HomeAssistant-OctopusEnergy/services/#octopus_energyget_intelligent_dispatch_history.
get_point_in_time_intelligent_dispatch_h.name: Get point in time intelligent dispatch history

start_date.name: Date
start_date.description: The date the data should be loaded from.

refresh_previous_consumption_data.description: Refreshes the previous consumption data for a given entity from a given date.
refresh_previous_consumption_data.name: Refresh previous consumption data

spin_wheel_of_fortune.description: Spins the wheel of fortune for a given energy type
spin_wheel_of_fortune.name: Spin wheel of fortune

points_to_redeem.name: Points to redeem
points_to_redeem.description: The number of points to redeem

redeem_octoplus_points_into_account_cred.description: Redeems a given number of octoplus points into account credit
redeem_octoplus_points_into_account_cred.name: Redeem octoplus points into account credit

weightings.name: Weightings
weightings.description: The collection of time periods and associated weightings to apply.

register_rate_weightings.description: Registers external weightings against rates, for use with target rate sensors when calculating target periods.
register_rate_weightings.name: Register rate weightings

event_code.name: Event code
event_code.description: The code of the event that is to be joined.

join_octoplus_saving_session_event.description: Joins a given Octoplus saving session event.
join_octoplus_saving_session_event.name: Join Octoplus saving session event

is_tracking_enabled.name: Is tracking enabled
is_tracking_enabled.description: Determines if the cost tracker should be enabled or disabled.

reset_cost_tracker.description: Resets a given cost tracker back to zero.
reset_cost_tracker.name: Reset cost tracker

date.name: Date
date.description: The date to adjust within the accumulative cost tracker

cost.name: Cost
cost.description: The new cost for the selected date

consumption.name: Consumption
consumption.description: The new consumption for the selected date

adjust_accumulative_cost_tracker.description: Adjusts a record within an accumulative cost tracker (e.g. sensor.octopus_energy_cost_tracker_{{COST_TRACKER_NAME}}_week or sensor.octopus_energy_cost_tracker_{{COST_TRACKER_NAME}}_month)
adjust_accumulative_cost_tracker.name: Adjusts accumulative cost tracker

datetime.name: DateTime
datetime.description: The datetime of the period to adjust within the cost tracker

consumption.name: Consumption
consumption.description: The new consumption for the selected date

adjust_cost_tracker.description: Adjusts a record within todays cost tracker (e.g. sensor.octopus_energy_cost_tracker_{{COST_TRACKER_NAME}})
adjust_cost_tracker.name: Adjusts cost tracker

description.example: A more complete description of the to-do item than that provided by the summary.
A more complete description of the to-do item than that provided by the summary.
Meeting to provide technical review for 'Phoenix' design.

unlock.description: True to unlock charging port, false to lock.

left_level.description: Heating level for the left seat (0 = Off, 1 = Low, 2 = Medium, 3 = High).

right_level.description: Heating level for the right seat (0 = Off, 1 = Low, 2 = Medium, 3 = High).

control_heated_seats.description: Control the heated seat levels for both front seats.

should_open.description: True to open the sunroof, false to close.

current_limit.description: Select the desired charging current limit.

set_charging_current_limit.description: Set the charging current limit for the vehicle.

set_target_soc.description: Set the target SOC (State of Charge) for the vehicle.

ac_on.description: Turn AC on or off (true = AC ON, false = AC OFF).

start_climate.description: Start the vehicle's Climate system with temperature and fan settings.

start_battery_heating.description: Start the vehicle battery heating process.

start_front_defrost.description: Start the front defrost system of the vehicle.

stop_battery_heating.description: Stop the vehicle battery heating process.

update_vehicle_data.description: Manually trigger a data update from the vehicle.
